targets.expr: sum by(method, uri) (rate(http_server_requests_seconds_sum{application="axon-showcase", service="axon-showcase-api-gateway", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m]) / rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{application="axon-showcase", service="axon-showcase-api-gateway", uri!~"/actuator.*"}[1m]))

max by(payloadType) (rate(eventProcessor_allTimer_seconds_sum{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-command-service", processorName="event-publishing"} [1m]) / rate(eventProcessor_allTimer_seconds_count{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-command-service", processorName="event-publishing"}[1m]))

max by(payloadType) (rate(eventProcessor_allTimer_seconds_sum{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-command-service", processorName="showcase-saga"} [1m]) / rate(eventProcessor_allTimer_seconds_count{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-command-service", processorName="showcase-saga"}[1m]))

sum by (error) (rate(fetch_showcase_list_seconds_count{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-query-service", error!="none"}[1m])) + sum by (error) (rate(fetch_showcase_by_id_seconds_count{application="$application", service="axon-showcase-query-service", error!="none"}[1m]))
